description:
Takohachi is mistaken for a rich man.  A man`s generosity spares another man`s life. A man marries the spirit of the willow tree outside his house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takohachi Chouja / Bunshichi Mottoi / Oryuu Yanagi
The Takohachi Rich Man / Bunshichi Mottoi / The Oryuu Willow
蛸八長者 / 文七元結 / おりゅう柳
